isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - ROCKWELL TANDEM AXLE FORWARD REAR DRIVE UNITS - ASSEMBLE - CHECKING AND ADJUSTING THE END PLAY OF THE OUTPUT BEARING

svcproc.title: CHECKING AND ADJUSTING THE END PLAY OF THE OUTPUT BEARING
svcproc.para: Specification: 0.001-0.004 inch (0.025-0.102 mm) bearing end play.

The end play of the output bearing is controlled by the size of the snap ring that holds the bearings in the output cage. The snap rings are available in increments of 0.003 inch (0.076 mm). Install the snap ring which results in an end play of 0.001 to 0.004 inch (0.025 to 0.102 mm).

step1.para: Put the output shaft and the bearing cage assembly in a vise with soft metal covers on the jaws of the vise.
Use a suitable tool to install the yoke or flange on the output shaft. DO NOT USE THE NUT TO DRAW THE YOKE ONTO THE SHAFT. DO NOT INSTALL THE OIL SEAL AT THIS TIME.
Install the nut that fastens the yoke or flange to the output shaft. Put a holding tool on the yoke or flange and tighten the nut to 450 to 600 ft-lbs. (610 to 815 Nm).
Push the yoke or flange toward the cage and rotate the shaft in each direction to make sure that the bearings are correctly installed.

Install a dial indicator so that the base of the indicator is on the mounting flange of the cage. The pointer of the indicator must touch the yoke or flange end of the output shaft. Adjust the dial indicator to the zero (0) setting ( Figure 116).

Put pry bars under the yoke or flange and push the yoke or flange away from the cage. Record the reading on the dial indicator. The reading must be 0.001 to 0.004 inch (0.025 to 0.102 mm). The reading is the measurement of the end play on the output bearing.

If the end play reading is not within the 0.001 to 0.004 inch (0.025 to 0.102 mm) specification, remove and replace the snap ring that fastens the bearings in the cage. Install a thinner snap ring to increase end play. Install a thicker snap ring to decrease end play ( Figure 117).

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. TO INCREASE END PLAY, INSTALL A THINNER SNAP RING. TO DECREASE END PLAY, INSTALL A THICKER SNAP RING.

step1.para: Remove the nut that fastens the yoke or flange to the through shaft. Use a suitable puller tool to remove the yoke.
